content: if you are looking for a quick and easy knit pattern that would be great to use up the last bit of skein then you have come to the right place garibaldi is a classic knit ear warmer made with super bulky yarn it has a unique stitch texture which creates interest in this simple knit garibaldi knits up quickly and is ideal for scrap yarn this is a great knit for an advanced beginner **this pattern is being offered as a free download for the remainder of 2019** **size ** adult one size - head circumference 21-23 **gauge ** 4 x 4 = 10 stitches x 20 rounds in established textured stitch **yarn ** wool-ease thick & quick solids by lion brand yarns approximately 40 yards **techniques ** advanced beginner knit knitting in the round slip stitches decreases share your finished hat on social media and tag @theknittypine / #theknittypinediy / #garibaldiearwarmer finished items created using this pattern may be sold only if full credit is given to the knitty pine / etsy ca/shop/theknittypineshop the pattern and photos used in this pattern are the property of the knitty pine and may not be used for resale purposes
